dmca.title: defraud financial on right to the image
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: frenchsiren frenchsiren [mailto:frenchsirene@hotmail.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 20, 2006 4:51 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com;
legal-response2@theplanet.com
Subject: defraud financial on right to the image 



you thus explain that it is authorized to use my image on Internet and to
benefit from it financial without my knowledge ?

every several years even disaines of years ?  

without the contract initial being respected ?  

how does that occur you it since there are two copyright on the same
photographs ?  

what don't I make any more part of site THEWIVESCLUB, but it continuous
produce money on my image without my authorization ?  

and without does counterpart, on which international text of laws of the
right have the image, base your answer ? 

to advise me you to take a lawyer, so that the financial fraud does cease ? 

very thanks for your answer 



FrenchSiren

 <http://www.southern-charms.com/frenchsiren/photos.htm>
http://www.southern-charms.com/frenchsiren/photos.htm

http://www.superslidesexii.co.uk/frenchsiren/


  _____

>Subject: [ABUSE] copyright infringement

>From: frenchsiren frenchsiren <frenchsirene@hotmail.com>
>To: abuse@theplanet.com
>
>
>
>Hello,
>
>I address this enamel for the reasons to you following:
>
>I am the model of the bond below, nevertheless my participation and
>collaboration with the site (thewivesclub) with ended, has all the levels,
>since 2005. and the 90 days period is amply exceeded.
>
> http://www.thewivesclub.com/frenchsiren/signup.htm
>
>he is particularly dishonest person to find my page still active.
>
>the use of my image, (Article L 113-3 of the CPI) is subordinated to my
>agreement, which does not exist any more, and requires which more have a
>financial counterpart, which it does not exist either any more.
>
>You thus made a fraudulent use of my image as well as image of my
>photographer.
>
> it is also a fraud for the consumers of all planet likely to be able to
>subscribe by accesses Internet, since I does not appear any more on the
>presentation of site THEWIVESCLUB.
>
> http://www.thewivesclub.com/will
>
>please agree to make all the provisions, within shortest time.
>
>1 - so that the means of payments is not accessible (CCBILL)
>
>2 - destruction of page (THEWIVESCLUB)
>
>the photographs are since under another licence, against which you expose
>yourselves to judicaire continuation
>
>thank you
>
>*FrenchSiren*
>
